stepAnswer: You should use innovative, pretty, and fresh charts, but repeat charts if asking your audience to perform the same task with the same type of data.
stepTitle: Which choice is a true statement?
choices: You should mix charts up randomly to keep your audience on their toes.
You should use innovative, pretty, and fresh charts, but repeat charts if asking your audience to perform the same task with the same type of data.
You should use innovative, pretty, and fresh charts, but never ever repeat the same chart.
You should use the old standard charts exclusively: bars, lines, and pies.
